mapper.sql: cpy.cpy_name AS cpyName, cpy.cpy_telephone AS cpyTelephone, cpy.cpy_brand AS cpyBrand, ccp.cbs_operator AS ccpName, ccp.cbs_operator_phone AS ccpTelephone, cpy.cpy_email AS ccpEmail, ccp.cbs_operator_qq AS ccpQq
mapper.select:
SELECT id , tdl_name AS tdlName, tdl_key AS tdlKey, tdl_address AS tdlAddress, tdl_tel AS tdlTel, tdl_nearby_spots AS tdlNearbySpots, tdl_nearby_hotel AS tdlNearbyHotel, tdl_nearby_architecture AS tdlNearbyArchitecture, tdl_position AS tdlPosition, tdl_is_credit AS tdlIsCredit, tdl_time_open AS tdlTimeOpen, tdl_time_close AS tdlTimeClose, tdl_comment AS tdlComment, tdl_visit AS tdlVisit, tdl_message AS tdlMessage, tdl_createtime AS tdlCreatetime, tdl_createuser AS tdlCreateuser, tdl_maintenance_time AS tdlMaintenanceTime, tdl_is_through AS tdlIsThrough, tdl_through_time AS tdlThroughTime, tdl_through_user AS tdlThroughUser, tdl_province AS tdlProvince, tdl_city AS tdlCity, tdl_min AS tdlMin, tdl_server AS tdlServer, tdl_cash_cvoucher AS tdlCashCvoucher, tdl_in_the_park AS tdlInThePark, tdl_in_the_address AS tdlInTheAddress, tdl_using_this_dictionary AS tdlUsingThisDictionary, tdl_fee_description AS tdlFeeDescription, tdl_contact_person AS tdlContacPerson, tdl_validity AS tdlValidity, tdl_in_security AS tdlInSecurity, tdl_state_price AS tdlStatePrice, tdl_refund_instructions AS tdlRefundInstructions, tdl_is_del_status AS tdlIsDelStatus, tdl_referential_policies AS tdlReferentialPolicies, tdl_set_reservation AS tdlSetReservation, tdl_security_guide AS tdlSecurityGuide, tdl_iphone AS tdlIphone, tdl_qq AS tdlQq, tdl_email AS tdlEmail, tdl_county AS tdlCounty, cpy_id AS cpyId, tdl_attractions AS tdlAttractions, tdl_nation AS tdlNation, tdl_code AS tdlCode, tdl_num AS tdlNum, tdl_scenic_level AS tdlScenicLevel, tdl_within_or_outer AS tdlWithinOrOuter, tdl_longitude AS tdlLongitude, tdl_latitude AS tdlLatitude, tdl_countyone AS tdlCountyone, tdl_ciityone AS tdlCityone, tdl_addtheme AS tdlAddtheme, tdl_img4 AS tdlImg4, tdl_img2 AS tdlImg2, tdl_img3 AS tdlImg3, tdl_img1 AS tdlImg1, tdl_scheduled AS tdlScheduled FROM ticket_detail
ORDER BY tdl_is_del_status DESC, tdl_createtime DESC

SELECT ticket.id AS id, tdl_name AS tdlName, tdl_key AS tdlKey, tdl_address AS tdlAddress, tdl_tel AS tdlTel, tdl_nearby_spots AS tdlNearbySpots, tdl_nearby_hotel AS tdlNearbyHotel, tdl_nearby_architecture AS tdlNearbyArchitecture, tdl_position AS tdlPosition, tdl_is_credit AS tdlIsCredit, tdl_time_open AS tdlTimeOpen, tdl_time_close AS tdlTimeClose, tdl_comment AS tdlComment, tdl_visit AS tdlVisit, tdl_message AS tdlMessage, tdl_createtime AS tdlCreatetime, tdl_createuser AS tdlCreateuser, tdl_maintenance_time AS tdlMaintenanceTime, tdl_is_through AS tdlIsThrough, tdl_through_time AS tdlThroughTime, tdl_through_user AS tdlThroughUser, tdl_province AS tdlProvince, tdl_city AS tdlCity, tdl_min AS tdlMin, tdl_server AS tdlServer, tdl_cash_cvoucher AS tdlCashCvoucher, tdl_in_the_park AS tdlInThePark, tdl_in_the_address AS tdlInTheAddress, tdl_using_this_dictionary AS tdlUsingThisDictionary, tdl_fee_description AS tdlFeeDescription, tdl_contact_person AS tdlContacPerson, tdl_validity AS tdlValidity, tdl_in_security AS tdlInSecurity, tdl_state_price AS tdlStatePrice, tdl_refund_instructions AS tdlRefundInstructions, tdl_is_del_status AS tdlIsDelStatus, tdl_referential_policies AS tdlReferentialPolicies, tdl_set_reservation AS tdlSetReservation, tdl_security_guide AS tdlSecurityGuide, tdl_iphone AS tdlIphone, tdl_qq AS tdlQq, tdl_email AS tdlEmail, tdl_county AS tdlCounty, ticket.cpy_id AS cpyId, tdl_attractions AS tdlAttractions, tdl_nation AS tdlNation, tdl_code AS tdlCode, tdl_num AS tdlNum, tdl_scenic_level AS tdlScenicLevel, tdl_within_or_outer AS tdlWithinOrOuter, tdl_longitude AS tdlLongitude, tdl_latitude AS tdlLatitude, tdl_countyone AS tdlCountyone, tdl_ciityone AS tdlCityone, tdl_addtheme AS tdlAddtheme, tdl_img4 AS tdlImg4, tdl_img2 AS tdlImg2, tdl_img3 AS tdlImg3, tdl_img1 AS tdlImg1, tdl_scheduled AS tdlScheduled,
(SELECT a.tpl_trade_price FROM ( SELECT tdl_id, tcl_id, tpl_trade_price FROM ticket_price WHERE tpl_date = #{tplDate} AND tpl_is_open = '02' ORDER BY tpl_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.tdl_id = ticket.id GROUP BY a.tcl_id ORDER BY a.tpl_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS tplTradePrice,
(SELECT a.tpl_sign FROM ( SELECT tdl_id, tcl_id, tpl_trade_price, tpl_sign FROM ticket_price WHERE tpl_date = #{tplDate} AND tpl_is_open = '02' ORDER BY tpl_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.tdl_id = ticket.id GROUP BY a.tcl_id ORDER BY a.tpl_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS tplSign,
(SELECT a.tpl_is_sign FROM ( SELECT tdl_id, tcl_id, tpl_trade_price, tpl_is_sign FROM ticket_price WHERE tpl_date = #{tplDate} AND tpl_is_open = '02' ORDER BY tpl_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.tdl_id = ticket.id GROUP BY a.tcl_id ORDER BY a.tpl_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS tplIsSign,
(SELECT a.tcl_id FROM ( SELECT tdl_id, tcl_id, tpl_trade_price, tpl_is_sign FROM ticket_price WHERE tpl_date = #{tplDate} AND tpl_is_open = '02' ORDER BY tpl_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.tdl_id = ticket.id GROUP BY a.tcl_id ORDER BY a.tpl_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS tclId,
FROM ticket_detail ticket LEFT JOIN company_detail cpy ON ticket.cpy_id = cpy.id LEFT JOIN company_business ccp on ccp.cpy_id = ticket.cpy_id WHERE tdl_is_del_status = '1' AND ticket.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'TICKET' ) AND

SELECT count(1) FROM ticket_detail ticket WHERE tdl_is_del_status = '1' AND ticket.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'TICKET' )

SELECT id, tdl_name AS tdlName, tdl_key AS tdlKey, tdl_address AS tdlAddress, tdl_tel AS tdlTel, tdl_nearby_spots AS tdlNearbySpots, tdl_nearby_hotel AS tdlNearbyHotel, tdl_nearby_architecture AS tdlNearbyArchitecture, tdl_position AS tdlPosition, tdl_is_credit AS tdlIsCredit, tdl_time_open AS tdlTimeOpen, tdl_time_close AS tdlTimeClose, tdl_comment AS tdlComment, tdl_visit AS tdlVisit, tdl_message AS tdlMessage, tdl_img1 AS tdlImg1, tdl_createtime AS tdlCreatetime, tdl_createuser AS tdlCreateuser, tdl_maintenance_time AS tdlMaintenanceTime, tdl_is_through AS tdlIsThrough, tdl_through_time AS tdlThroughTime, tdl_through_user AS tdlThroughUser, tdl_province AS tdlProvince, tdl_city AS tdlCity, tdl_min AS tdlMin, tdl_server AS tdlServer, tdl_cash_cvoucher AS tdlCashCvoucher, tdl_in_the_park AS tdlInThePark, tdl_in_the_address AS tdlInTheAddress, tdl_using_this_dictionary AS tdlUsingThisDictionary, tdl_fee_description AS tdlFeeDescription, tdl_contact_person AS tdlContacPerson, tdl_validity AS tdlValidity, tdl_in_security AS tdlInSecurity, tdl_state_price AS tdlStatePrice, tdl_refund_instructions AS tdlRefundInstructions, tdl_is_del_status AS tdlIsDelStatus, tdl_referential_policies AS tdlReferentialPolicies, tdl_set_reservation AS tdlSetReservation, tdl_security_guide AS tdlSecurityGuide, tdl_iphone AS tdlIphone, tdl_qq AS tdlQq, tdl_email AS tdlEmail, tdl_county AS tdlCounty, tdl_within_or_outer AS tdlWithinOrOuter, tdl_state AS tdlState, tdl_longitude AS tdlLongitude, tdl_latitude AS tdlLatitude, tdl_theme AS tdlTheme, tdl_cash_fare AS tdlCashFare, tdl_vip_ticket AS tdlVipTicket, tdl_cash_type AS tdlCashType, cpy_id AS cpyId, tdl_attractions AS tdlAttractions, tdl_nation AS tdlNation, tdl_code AS tdlCode, tdl_num AS tdlNum, tdl_scenic_level AS tdlScenicLevel, tdl_countyone AS tdlCountyone, tdl_ciityone AS tdlCityone, tdl_addtheme AS tdlAddtheme, tdl_img4 AS tdlImg4, tdl_img2 AS tdlImg2, tdl_img3 AS tdlImg3, tdl_scheduled AS tdlScheduled FROM ticket_detail WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ticket_detail ( tdl_name, tdl_key, tdl_address, tdl_tel, tdl_nearby_spots, tdl_nearby_hotel, tdl_nearby_architecture, tdl_position, tdl_is_credit, tdl_time_open, tdl_time_close, tdl_comment, tdl_visit, tdl_message, tdl_img1, tdl_createtime, tdl_createuser, tdl_through_time, tdl_through_user, tdl_province, tdl_city, tdl_min, tdl_server , tdl_is_through, tdl_cash_cvoucher, tdl_in_the_park, tdl_in_the_address, tdl_using_this_dictionary, tdl_fee_description, tdl_contact_person, tdl_maintenance_time, tdl_validity, tdl_in_security, tdl_state_price, tdl_refund_instructions, tdl_is_del_status, tdl_referential_policies, tdl_set_reservation, tdl_security_guide, tdl_iphone, tdl_qq, tdl_email, tdl_county, tdl_within_or_outer, tdl_state, tdl_longitude, tdl_latitude, tdl_theme, tdl_cash_fare, tdl_vip_ticket, tdl_scenic_level, tdl_cash_type, cpy_id, tdl_attractions, tdl_nation, tdl_num, tdl_countyone, tdl_ciityone, tdl_addtheme, tdl_img4, tdl_img2, tdl_img3, tdl_scheduled ) VALUES ( #{tdlName}, #{tdlKey}, #{tdlAddress}, #{tdlTel}, #{tdlNearbySpots}, #{tdlNearbyHotel}, #{tdlNearbyArchitecture}, #{tdlPosition}, #{tdlIsCredit}, #{tdlTimeOpen}, #{tdlTimeClose}, #{tdlComment}, #{tdlVisit}, #{tdlMessage}, #{tdlImg1}, #{tdlCreatetime}, #{tdlCreateuser}, #{tdlThroughTime}, #{tdlThroughUser}, #{tdlProvince}, #{tdlCity}, #{tdlMin}, #{tdlServer}, #{tdlIsThrough}, #{tdlCashCvoucher}, #{tdlInThePark}, #{tdlInTheAddress}, #{tdlUsingThisDictionary}, #{tdlFeeDescription}, #{tdlContacPerson}, #{tdlMaintenanceTime}, #{tdlValidity}, #{tdlInSecurity}, #{tdlStatePrice}, #{tdlRefundInstructions}, #{tdlIsDelStatus}, #{tdlReferentialPolicies}, #{tdlSetReservation}, #{tdlSecurityGuide}, #{tdlIphone}, #{tdlQq}, #{tdlEmail}, #{tdlCounty}, #{tdlWithinOrOuter}, #{tdlState}, #{tdlLongitude}, #{tdlLatitude}, #{tdlTheme}, #{tdlCashFare}, #{tdlVipTicket}, #{tdlScenicLevel}, #{tdlCashType}, #{cpyId}, #{tdlAttractions}, #{tdlNation}, #{tdlNum}, #{tdlCountyone}, #{tdlCityone}, #{tdlAddtheme}, #{tdlImg4}, #{tdlImg2}, #{tdlImg3}, #{tdlScheduled}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket_detail SET tdl_key = #{tdlKey}, tdl_tel = #{tdlTel}, tdl_min = #{tdlMin}, tdl_img1 = #{tdlImg1}, tdl_city = #{tdlCity}, tdl_name = #{tdlName}, tdl_visit = #{tdlVisit}, tdl_server = #{tdlServer}, tdl_comment = #{tdlComment}, tdl_message = #{tdlMessage}, tdl_address = #{tdlAddress}, tdl_province = #{tdlProvince}, tdl_position = #{tdlPosition}, tdl_time_open = #{tdlTimeOpen}, tdl_is_credit = #{tdlIsCredit}, tdl_time_close = #{tdlTimeClose}, tdl_in_the_park = #{tdlInThePark}, tdl_nearby_hotel = #{tdlNearbyHotel}, tdl_nearby_spots = #{tdlNearbySpots}, tdl_through_user = #{tdlThroughUser}, tdl_through_time = #{tdlThroughTime}, tdl_cash_cvoucher = #{tdlCashCvoucher}, tdl_contact_person = #{tdlContacPerson}, tdl_in_the_address = #{tdlInTheAddress}, tdl_fee_description = #{tdlFeeDescription}, tdl_maintenance_time = #{tdlMaintenanceTime}, tdl_nearby_architecture = #{tdlNearbyArchitecture}, tdl_using_this_dictionary = #{tdlUsingThisDictionary}, tdl_validity = #{tdlValidity}, tdl_in_security = #{tdlInSecurity}, tdl_state_price = #{tdlStatePrice}, tdl_refund_instructions = #{tdlRefundInstructions}, tdl_referential_policies = #{tdlReferentialPolicies}, tdl_set_reservation = #{tdlSetReservation}, tdl_security_guide = #{tdlSecurityGuide}, tdl_iphone = #{tdlIphone}, tdl_qq = #{tdlQq}, tdl_email = #{tdlEmail}, tdl_within_or_outer = #{tdlWithinOrOuter}, tdl_state = #{tdlState}, tdl_longitude = #{tdlLongitude}, tdl_latitude = #{tdlLatitude}, tdl_theme = #{tdlTheme}, tdl_cash_fare = #{tdlCashFare}, tdl_vip_ticket = #{tdlVipTicket}, tdl_scenic_level = #{tdlScenicLevel}, tdl_cash_type = #{tdlCashType}, tdl_county = #{tdlCounty}, tdl_attractions = #{tdlAttractions}, tdl_nation = #{tdlNation}, tdl_num = #{tdlNum}, tdl_countyone = #{tdlCountyone}, tdl_ciityone = #{tdlCityone}, tdl_createtime = #{tdlCreatetime}, tdl_addtheme = #{tdlAddtheme}, tdl_img4 = #{tdlImg4}, tdl_img2 = #{tdlImg2}, tdl_img3 = #{tdlImg3}, tdl_scheduled = #{tdlScheduled} WHERE id= #{id}
